title: Apple rumored to be planning larger OLED iPad Pros for 2024
description: We might see 11.1-inch and 13-inch tablets from Apple the next time that the iPad Pros get given a refresh.

title: One Apple iPhone 15 model could be cheaper than we were expecting
description: Underwhelming sales for the iPhone 14 Plus mean that Apple is seriously considering cutting the price of its successor.

title: Microsoft in 2022: year in review
description: What should we make of Microsoft’s massive gaming acquisition, and progress with Windows 11?
